name: Dumbbell Curl
explanation: A curl that targets your biceps with strict form.

name: Leg Press
explanation: A machine-based exercise that works the quadriceps and glutes.

name: Bench Press
explanation: A compound exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

name: Deadlift
explanation: A full-body exercise that primarily targets the hamstrings and lower back.

name: Pull-Up
explanation: A bodyweight exercise that targets the lats and biceps.
